set(PULP_ISS_WRAPPER "pulp_iss_wrapper.cpp")

generate_isa(NAME pulp.cpu.iss.iss_pulp_fc
    THINGY "--core=Pulp_fc_core@pulp.cpu.iss.pulp_cores"
    SOURCES ${PULP_ISS_WRAPPER}
    )
vp_model_compile_definitions(
    NAME pulp.cpu.iss.iss_pulp_fc
    DEFINITIONS
    -DEXTERNAL_ISS_WRAPPER=1
    -DPIPELINE_STAGES=2
    -DISS_SINGLE_REGFILE
    -DPCER_VERSION_2
    -DPRIV_1_10
    -DCONFIG_ISS_CORE=ri5cy
    )

generate_isa(NAME pulp.cpu.iss.iss_pulp_cluster
    THINGY "--core=Pulp_cluster_core@pulp.cpu.iss.pulp_cores"
    SOURCES ${PULP_ISS_WRAPPER}
    )
vp_model_compile_definitions(
    NAME pulp.cpu.iss.iss_pulp_cluster
    DEFINITIONS
    -DEXTERNAL_ISS_WRAPPER=1
    -DPIPELINE_STAGES=2
    -DISS_SINGLE_REGFILE
    -DPCER_VERSION_2
    -DPRIV_1_10
    -DCONFIG_ISS_CORE=ri5cy
    )

# generate_isa(NAME pulp.cpu.iss.iss_rv64
#     THINGY "--core=Rv64@pulp.cpu.iss.rv64"
#     IRQ "riscv"
#     SOURCES "default_iss_wrapper.cpp"
#     )
# vp_model_compile_definitions(
#     NAME pulp.cpu.iss.iss_rv64
#     DEFINITIONS
#     -DEXTERNAL_ISS_WRAPPER=1
#     -DPIPELINE_STAGES=2
#     -DPCER_VERSION_2
#     -DPRIV_1_10
#     -DCONFIG_ISS_CORE=ri5cy
#     -DISS_WORD_64
#     )

    generate_isa(NAME pulp.cpu.iss.iss_rv32
    THINGY "--core=Rv32@pulp.cpu.iss.rv32"
    IRQ "riscv"
    SOURCES "default_iss_wrapper.cpp"
    )
vp_model_compile_definitions(
    NAME pulp.cpu.iss.iss_rv32
    DEFINITIONS
    -DEXTERNAL_ISS_WRAPPER=1
    -DPIPELINE_STAGES=2
    -DPCER_VERSION_2
    -DPRIV_1_10
    -DCONFIG_ISS_CORE=ri5cy
    )

generate_isa(NAME pulp.cpu.iss.iss_snitch_64
    THINGY "--core=Rv64@pulp.cpu.iss.snitch"
    SOURCES "default_iss_wrapper.cpp"
    )
vp_model_compile_definitions(
    NAME pulp.cpu.iss.iss_snitch_64
    DEFINITIONS
    -DEXTERNAL_ISS_WRAPPER=1
    -DPIPELINE_STAGES=1
    -DPCER_VERSION_2
    -DPRIV_1_10
    -DCONFIG_ISS_CORE=ri5cy
    -DISS_WORD_64
    -DCONFIG_RV32V=1
    )

generate_isa(NAME pulp.cpu.iss.iss_snitch
    THINGY "--core=Rv32@pulp.cpu.iss.snitch"
    SOURCES "default_iss_wrapper.cpp"
    )
vp_model_compile_definitions(
    NAME pulp.cpu.iss.iss_snitch
    DEFINITIONS
    -DEXTERNAL_ISS_WRAPPER=1
    -DPIPELINE_STAGES=1
    -DPCER_VERSION_2
    -DPRIV_1_10
    -DCONFIG_ISS_CORE=ri5cy
    -DISS_WORD_32
    -DCONFIG_RV32V=1
    )
